s0202: Wei Ling Gong's wife was named Nan Zi, she sent someone to tell Confucius: 'Gentlemen from the four directions who do not consider it humiliating to become brothers with my lord must see my little lord.
s0203: My little lord wishes to see.'
s0204: Confucius declined politely, but had no choice and saw her.
s0205: The wife was in thin curtains.
s0206: Confucius entered the gate, faced north and bowed with hands to ground.
s0207: The wife bowed twice from within the curtains, her jade pendants clinking.
s0208: Confucius said: 'I wished not to see, having seen I respond with ritual.'
s0210: Confucius swore saying: 'If I have done wrong, Heaven reject me!
s0212: After staying in Wei over a month, Ling Gong and his wife rode in the same chariot, eunuch Yong Qu was the passenger, went out, made Confucius the next chariot, swaggered through the market past him.
s0213: Confucius said: 'I have never seen one who loves virtue like loving beauty.'
s0214: Thus he despised it and left Wei, passing through Cao.
s0215: This year, Lu Ding Gong died.
s0216: Confucius left Cao for Song, practicing ritual with disciples under a large tree.
s0217: Song commander Huan Tui wanted to kill Confucius, chopped down his tree.
s0220: Confucius said: 'Heaven has endowed virtue in me, what can Huan Tui do to me!'
s0221: Confucius went to Zheng, became separated from his disciples, Confucius stood alone at the eastern gate of the outer wall.
s0222: A Zheng person told Zi Gong: 'There is a man at the eastern gate, his forehead resembles Yao, his neck resembles Gao Tao, his shoulders resemble Zi Chan, but from the waist down he is three cun shorter than Yu.
s0225: Confucius smiled happily and said: 'Appearance is superficial.
s0226: But to say resembling a homeless dog, yes indeed!
s0228: Confucius arrived at Chen, staying at the home of Director of Construction Zhen Zi.
s0229: Over a year, Wu King Fu Chai attacked Chen, took three cities and left.
s0231: Chu besieged Cai, Cai moved to Wu.
s0232: Wu defeated Yue King Gou Jian at Kuaiji.
s0233: A falcon gathered in the Chen court and died, pierced by a hu arrow, stone point, the arrow a chi and eight cun long.
s0234: Chen Min Gong sent an envoy to ask Confucius.
s0235: Confucius said: 'The falcon came from afar, this is a Su Shen arrow.
s0236: In the past when King Wu conquered Shang, he opened roads to the nine Yi and hundred Man, made each bring their local tribute to contribute, so they would not forget their duties.
s0237: Thus Su Shen contributed hu arrows and stone points, a chi and eight cun long.
s0238: The former kings wished to display their excellent virtue, divided the Su Shen arrows to give to Da Ji, matched with Yu Hu Gong and enfeoffed them at Chen.
s0239: Divided same surnames with precious jade to display closeness;
s0240: divided different surnames with distant duties so they would not forget submission.
s0241: Therefore divided Chen with Su Shen arrows.'
s0242: They tried seeking in the old treasury, indeed found them.
s0243: Confucius stayed in Chen three years, when Jin and Chu contended for strength, alternately attacking Chen, and Wu invaded Chen, Chen was constantly raided.
s0246: My party's youths are simple and ardent, advancing and gaining without forgetting their beginnings.'
s0248: Passing through Pu, encountered Gong Shu clan rebelling with Pu, Pu people stopped Confucius.
s0249: Among disciples was Gong Liang Ru, who followed Confucius with five private chariots.
s0250: His character was tall and worthy, with courage and strength, he said: 'I once followed master and encountered difficulty at Kuang, now encounter difficulty here again, it is fate.
s0251: I and master have suffered difficulty twice, would rather fight and die.'
s0252: Confucius said: 'Alas, have you not heard?
s0253: The people are the foundation of the state, foundation solid the state is peaceful.
s0254: Now if we stop, how can I conduct myself?
s0255: Your fate is fate, my fate is fate.'
s0256: Gong Liang Ru said: 'Master cannot, I will go with master.'
s0257: Confucius said: 'You still consider me worthy, I am not worthy.
s0258: I do not try, thus am skilled.'
s0259: Confucius traveled, Gong Liang Ru was surrounded by Pu people, Confucius sent Zi Gong to persuade them.
s0260: Zi Gong went, said: 'Master being here is Pu's calamity.
s0261: If you can release his disciples, then it is master's calamity.
s0262: Master fortunately escapes, it is Pu's calamity.
s0263: Now where master is, the Wei lord contends with Pu people for him.
s0264: If you release him, then Wei lord contends with Pu people for him.
s0265: Master not wishing to see, then also useless.
s0266: If he sees, then it is master's calamity.'
s0267: Pu people released Gong Liang Ru and stopped Confucius.
s0268: Confucius heard of it, angry, said: 'Lu and Wei's governance are like brothers.
s0269: Now Lu and Wei are hostile, is it brothers' resentment?
s0270: Master's service cannot have two minds.
s0271: Therefore Lu people stop master, Wei people also stop master.
s0272: Master not going to Jin and Wei is not fearing the feudal lords.
s0274: Now cutting off Lu and Wei, then bad for those wishing to see.
s0275: If wishing to see, then first release oneself.
s0276: Thus Confucius from Wei went to Jin, passing through Kuang, Kuang people heard of it, thought he was Lu Yang Hu.
s0277: Therefore surrounded Confucius, disciples all had hungry appearance.
s0278: Confucius said: 'Since King Wen has passed, is culture not here?
s0279: If Heaven will lose this culture, later deaths cannot participate in this culture.
s0280: If Heaven has not lost this culture, what can Kuang people do to me!'
s0281: Confucius knew disciples had worried appearance, told Zi Gong: 'Have you heard?'
s0283: If there is calamity here, then it is master's calamity.
s0284: If there is no calamity here, then it is Kuang people's calamity.
s0285: If stop, then it is master's calamity.
s0286: If travel, then it is Kuang people's calamity.
s0288: Confucius said: 'Ci, you only know one, not two.
s0289: Since King Wen has passed, is culture not here?
s0290: If Heaven will lose this culture, later deaths cannot participate in this culture.
s0291: If Heaven has not lost this culture, what can Kuang people do to me!'
s0292: Confucius having explained, Kuang people welcomed Confucius.
s0293: Confucius arrived at Wei, Wei Hou welcomed him at the suburbs.
s0294: Confucius returned and stayed in Zou village, composing the Zou song to mourn.
s0295: Then returned to Wei, staying at Qu Bo Yu's home.
s0296: Another day, Ling Gong asked about military formations.
s0297: Confucius said: 'Ritual matters I have heard of, military matters I have not studied.'
s0298: The next day, spoke with Confucius, saw flying geese, looked up at them, his attention not on Confucius.
s0299: Confucius thus left, returning to Chen.
s0300: Summer, Wei Ling Gong died, established grandson Jie, who became Wei Chu Gong.
s0301: Sixth month, Zhao Yang brought crown prince Kuai Kui inside Qi.
s0302: Yang Hu made the crown prince wear mourning clothes, eight people in mourning attire, falsely as those welcoming from Wei, crying as they entered, thus resided there.
s0303: Winter, Cai moved to Zhou Lai.
s0304: This year was Lu Ai Gong's third year, Confucius was sixty years old.
s0305: Qi helped Wei besiege Qi because crown prince Kuai Kui was there.
s0306: Summer, Lu Huan Xi temple burned, Nan Gong Jing Shu saved the fire.
s0307: Confucius in Chen heard of it, said: 'The disaster must be at Huan Xi temple?'
s0309: Autumn, Ji Huan Zi ill, carried to see Lu's city walls, sighed deeply saying: 'In the past this state almost prospered, but because I offended Confucius, it did not prosper.'
s0310: Looking back at his heir Kang Zi said: 'I will die soon, you must govern Lu;
s0311: governing Lu, must summon Zhong Ni.'
s0312: After several days, Huan Zi died, Kang Zi succeeded.
s0313: After burial, wished to summon Zhong Ni.
s0314: Gong Yu Yu said: 'In the past our former lord employed him but not to the end, finally became the laughingstock of the feudal lords.
s0315: Now employing him again, if cannot finish, this is again becoming the laughingstock of the feudal lords.'
s0316: Kang Zi said: 'Then who can be summoned?'
s0318: Thus sent envoys to summon Ran Qiu.
s0319: Ran Qiu about to go, Confucius said: 'Lu people summon Qiu, not for small use, will greatly use him.'
s0320: That day, Confucius said: 'Return home! Return home!
s0321: My party's youths are ardent and simple, their patterns are brilliant, I do not know how to cut them.'
s0322: Zi Gong knew Confucius wished to return, sent Ran Qiu, admonishing to 'if employed, use Confucius as the banner.'
s0323: Ran Qiu having left, next year, Confucius from Chen moved to Cai.
s0324: Cai Zhao Gong about to go to Wu, Wu summoned him.
s0325: Previously Zhao Gong deceived his ministers to move Zhou Lai, now about to go, ministers feared he would move again, Gong Sun Pian shot and killed Zhao Gong.
s0328: Next year, Confucius from Cai went to Ye.
s0329: Ye Gong asked about governance, Confucius said: 'Governance lies in attracting the distant and attaching the near.'
s0330: Another day, Ye Gong asked Confucius to Zi Lu, Zi Lu did not answer.
s0331: Confucius heard of it, said: 'You, why not answer saying "His character is: studies the Way without tiring, teaches others without wearying, becomes indignant and forgets food, joyful and forgets worry, does not know old age is approaching" thus.'
s0333: Chang Ju and Jie Nie were plowing together, Confucius considered them recluses, sent Zi Lu to ask for directions.
s0334: Chang Ju said: 'That one holding the reins, who is he?'
s0339: Jie Nie told Zi Lu: 'Who are you?'
s0341: Said: 'Are you Lu Kong Qiu's disciple?'
s0343: Said: 'The whole world is flooded, who can change it? Rather than follow a scholar who avoids this person and that person, better follow those who avoid the world.'
s0344: Planted his hoe and would not speak.
s0345: Zi Lu returned and told Confucius, Confucius sadly said: 'One cannot herd with birds and beasts. If the world is not the Way, with whom shall I go?
s0346: If the world has the Way, what need have I to change?'
s0347: Zi Lu followed after, encountered an old man, carrying a hoe on his shoulder.
s0348: Zi Lu asked: 'Have you seen my master?'
s0349: The old man said: 'Your four limbs are not diligent, five grains not distinguished, who is your master?'
s0350: Planted his staff and weeded, Zi Lu stood with clasped hands.
s0351: Stayed Zi Lu overnight, killed a chicken and cooked millet to eat, showed his two sons.
s0352: Next day, Zi Lu traveled, told Confucius about it.
s0354: Sent Zi Lu to return and see him, arrived but he had left.
s0355: Zi Lu said: 'Not serving is unrighteous.
s0356: The order of elders and juniors cannot be abandoned;
s0357: the righteousness of ruler and minister, how can it be abandoned?
s0358: Wanting to cleanse one's body, but disrupting the great relationships.
s0359: A gentleman's service, executes his righteousness.
s0360: The Way not being practiced, I have long known it.'
s0361: Confucius said to Zi Lu: 'I have heard, gentlemen who follow the Way gain praise, those who hide their traces have no blame.
s0362: I will hide my traces here.'
s0363: Thus went to Cao from Cai.

s0612: Zi Si was born Bai, courtesy name Zi Shang, age forty-seven.
s0613: Zi Shang fathered Qiu, courtesy name Zi Jia, age forty-five.
s0614: Zi Jia fathered Ji, courtesy name Zi Jing, age forty-six.
s0615: Zi Jing fathered Chuan, courtesy name Zi Gao, age fifty-one.
s0616: Zi Gao fathered Zi Shen, age fifty-seven, once served as Wei chancellor.
s0617: Zi Shen fathered Fu, age fifty-seven, died in Chen serving Chen King Fu as doctor.
s0619: Once served as doctor to Emperor Hui of Han, moved to become governor of Changsha.
s0621: Zi Xiang fathered Zhong, age fifty-seven.
s0622: Zhong fathered Wu, Wu fathered Yan Nian and An Guo.
s0623: An Guo served as doctor to the current emperor, went to be governor of Linhuai, died young.
s0624: An Guo fathered Ang, Ang fathered Huan.
s0625: The Grand Historian says: "The Poetry says: 'High mountains look up to stop, shining path to walk."
s0626: Though unable to reach it, the heart turns toward it.
s0627: I read Confucius's books, imagine seeing his person.
s0628: Went to Lu, observed Confucius's temple hall carriage robes ritual vessels, the disciples with the times practice ritual in his home, I reverently lingered and could not leave.
s0629: The world has many kings and worthy people, when alive they are honored, when dead they end.
s0630: Confucius as commoner, transmitted for over ten generations, scholars revere him.
s0631: From kings and nobles of China, those speaking of the six arts take Confucius as the standard, can be called the utmost sage!"
